outcome: Footage revealing possible internal sabotage by a trusted administrator leads to an inquiry.

events.description: Footage surfaces showing a trusted administrator near the system core before major failures occurred.
A Council committee is tasked to investigate internal sabotage, causing mistrust among employees.
Interviews with system staff reveal increasing tension and finger-pointing, complicating the investigation.
Leaked inquiry reports suggest internal betrayal as the cause, shaking public trust in system handlers.
